HeroSection.title: One Pass to Vietnam's Best Fitness & Wellness Studios
HeroSection.description: Discover and choose from hundreds of studios across Vietnam with just one Lifepass application. Convenient, diverse and economical!

FeatureSection.mainTitle: Get access to the top studios and many additional fitness and wellness offers in your city and across Vietnam. Are you ready?
FeatureSection.journeyTitle: Embark on a new kind of fitness journey
FeatureSection.mobileDescription: Sick of the same old? You'll never get bored with us. Discover new activities every day.

endlessVariety.title: Endless variety

discoverNew.title: Discover something new

TestimonialSection.title: What our members think about us

testimonials.name: Duc Nguyen
testimonials.content: 1st time I used LifePass to book a cold plunge session at REBORN Fitness & Health in Thao Dien, and it was an amazing experience! The booking process was smooth, and I felt well taken care of during the session. LifePass offers a great variety of wellness activities like cold plunges, swimming, and personalized gym sessions at discounted prices, making it easy to discover new experiences. I'm excited to book more sessions at different locations through LifePass in the future. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Miley Le
testimonials.content: I've never been more motivated to work out. The variety of sports and facilities available is amazing!

CorporateFitness.title: Empower Your Teams with LifePass Corporate Fitness
CorporateFitness.description: Boost employee morale and health by offering exclusive fitness and wellness benefits. LifePass provides flexible solutions that fit your company's unique needs.

JoinCommunitySection.title: Join the LifePass Community
JoinCommunitySection.description: Subscribe to our newsletter and we'll update you when we onboard new partners and activities. You'll also have exclusive access to discounts, fitness, wellness, nutrition and lifestyle stories.

RediscoverYourself.title: Rediscover yourself
RediscoverYourself.description: Add variety to your workout and wellness plan by trying activities such as Ice Bath, Compression Booths or Acupuncture.

HowItWorks.title: Many activities to choose from in a single app
HowItWorks.imageAlt: Fitness app interface showing various sports activities

features.title: Become a member
features.description: Select one of our flexible memberships to start your fitness journey. That's all it takes.

features.title: Get inspired
features.description: Need some inspiration? Find partner venues and activities near you via your browser.

features.title: Book your workout
features.description: Secure yourself a spot in a class or for a solo workout and enjoy flexible cancellation, just in case plans change.

features.title: Check in - just like that
features.description: Arrive at your chosen venue, and check in with the confirmation email. It's that simple!

DiscoverPossibilities.title: Discover your possibilities
DiscoverPossibilities.description: Search and find all venues offering your favorite fitness and wellness activities. In your area, your city, and anywhere in Vietnam.

PricingIntroduction.title: Fitness and Wellness for Everyone
PricingIntroduction.description: Choose the plan that fits your budget and fitness needs.
